title: Japan's Nikkei falls as tech shares drag; Astellas surges
description: Japan's Nikkei index saw red on Thursday as technology stocks faltered, raising flags over the hefty investments tied to Artificial Intelligence. The decline was accentuated by a steep fall in shares of SoftBank Group, following Arm Holdings' disappointing revenue report. In contrast, the pharmaceuticals sector maintained its resilience, spurred by an optimistic forecast from Astellas Pharma which uplifted its stock.
content:

title: 'Software-mageddon' leaves investors bargain-hunting but wary
description: Wall Street's software sector is experiencing a significant downturn, dubbed "Software-mageddon," as investors grapple with the disruptive potential of artificial intelligence. This selloff, marked by substantial market capitalization losses, has led some to consider buying beaten-down stocks, while others await clearer signals of AI integration and its impact on future software sales.
content:

title: 'I pivoted to AI without a coding background', Indian origin shares how she got a Microsoft job - Trending News
description: From designing buildings in India to leading AI UX at Microsoft, Priyanka Kuvalekar’s journey is the ultimate blueprint for non-coders. Discover the 3-step strategy she used to pivot into Artificial Intelligence without a computer science degree and why "fluency" beats technical depth in the age of LLMs.
content: The transition from designing physical buildings to shaping the digital future of Artificial Intelligence might seem like a leap, but for Priyanka Kuvalekar, it was a strategic evolution. Now a 31-year-old UX research lead at Microsoft in Redmond, Wa... [2784 chars]

title: Delhi HC to pass orders protecting actor Vivek Oberoi’s personality rights
description: Actor and entrepreneur Vivek Oberoi moved the court saying artificial intelligence and deepfake technology were being used to morph and superimpose his face| India News

title: Global Market Today: From Wall Street to Asia, markets retreat as tech-led selloff sparks global risk aversion
description: Asian markets experienced a significant downturn on Thursday. Investors are worried about the escalating costs of Artificial Intelligence investments, leading to a shift away from technology stocks. A sharp decline in silver prices also impacted leveraged positions. This sentiment affected major indices across the Asia-Pacific region, with South Korea's KOSPI seeing a notable drop.
